name: 0000Bulky Marketing
description: Bulky Marketing is a trusted provider of WhatsApp Business API solutions, aiding businesses worldwide in efficient communication and engagement. Our platform caters to enterprises, SMBs, and growing businesses, offering services such as message broadcasting, notification automation, and customer support. We extend our expertise to service providers, media agencies, resellers, and technology enablers, delivering tailored solutions built on the WhatsApp Business API. With a focus on enhancing WhatsApp engagement, we empower businesses with automation, live chat, and AI chatbots, while also providing specialized marketing solutions for small businesses like builders, real estate developers, jewellers, and educational institutes.
focus_areas: WhatsApp Engagement Platform: Specializing in broadcasting automation, and chatbots for enhanced customer engagement and support.
Providing seamless integration of the WhatsApp Cloud API for technology enablers.
Outstanding customer support ensures clients get the help they need to use our solutions effectively.
